entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a teacher who beckons students inside the dungeon.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who heads for a table at the back of the dungeon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character and one of Hermione's friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Harry's friend who heads for a table at the back of the dungeon.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is introduced as a journalist who writes an article about Harry.

relationships.description: Snape turns his back on Hermione to write up the ingredients of today's potion.
Rita Skeeter writes an article about Harry entitled 'Harry Potter's Secret Heartache'.
Hermione finds what they were looking for in the center pages of a magazine under the desk.
Rita Skeeter writes an article about Harry entitled 'Harry Potter's Secret Heartache'.
